hipparcos.plot
Class Plot

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Canvas
              |
              +--hipparcos.plot.Plot
Direct Known Subclasses:
Histogram, SimplePlot
public class Plot
extends java.awt.Canvas

Plot just with axes and scale as base class for other plots like Histogram

See Also:
